meanings.sent1: The casebound journal had a sturdy cover.
meanings.sent2: I prefer casebound notebooks because they last longer.
meanings.sent3: The casebound book walked confidently on the shelf.
meanings.sent5: The casebound dictionary stood out among the paperbacks.

meanings.definition: A book with a hard cover.
meanings.sent1: I borrowed a casebound from the library.
meanings.sent2: The casebound on the shelf caught my eye.
meanings.sent3: The casebound whispered secrets to the paperbacks.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were a casebound of mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The casebound held stories waiting to be discovered.
